BDA.twitter

Class TwitterConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • BDA.twitter.TwitterConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceInstance

    public class TwitterConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceInstance
    Used to execute every twitter interaction.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    DElfim
